title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 429.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 429.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation
(office) may dispose of a work of art or historic object that has been acquired
by the State and is surplus to the needs of the office in accordance with the
terms and conditions set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
429.1

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 22, effective
6/4/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
